choices.text: fair coin is tossed independently n times, where n >= 2. Define the following events: Ak: the k-th toss is heads. Sn: the total number of heads observed in the n tosses is even. (Note that 0 is an even number). Is the collection of events A1, A2, A3, ... An, Sn independent? Hint: Consider P(Sn | A1 A2 A3 ... An)
